ayah_ar: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: So Allah made them taste humiliation in this worldly life, but far worse is the punishment of the Hereafter, if only they knew.

ayah_ar: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: It is a Quran revealed in Arabic without any crookedness, so perhaps they will be conscious of Allah.

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٞ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: You O Prophet will certainly die, and they will die too.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then on the Day of Judgment you will all settle your dispute before your Lord.

ayah_ar: وَأَنِيبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُواْ لَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Turn to your Lord in repentance, and fully submit to Him before the punishment reaches you, for then you will not be helped.

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Rather, worship Allah alone and be one of the grateful.

ayah_ar: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: It will be said to them, Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever. What an evil home for the arrogant!

ayah_ar: قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۗ وَأَرۡضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجۡرَهُم بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: Say O Prophet, that Allah says, O My servants who believe! Be mindful of your Lord. Those who do good in this world will have a good reward. And Allahs earth is spacious. Only those who endure patiently will be given their reward without limit.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحۡسَنَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who listen to what is said and follow the best of it. These are the ones rightly guided by Allah, and these are truly the people of reason.

ayah_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the gooddoers.

ayah_ar: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبۡدَهُۥۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: Is Allah not sufficient for His servant? Yet they threaten you with other powerless gods besides Him! Whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Do they not know that Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills? Surely in this are signs for people who believe.

ayah_ar: ۞قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسۡرَفُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَا تَقۡنَطُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغۡفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, that Allah says, O My servants who have exceeded the limits against their souls! Do not lose hope in Allahs mercy, for Allah certainly forgives all sins. He is indeed the AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَنَّةِ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ طِبۡتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُوهَا خَٰلِدِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And those who were mindful of their Lord will be led to Paradise in successive groups. When they arrive at its already open gates, its keepers will say, Peace be upon you! You have done well, so come in, to stay forever.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: We have certainly set forth every kind of lesson for people in this Quran, so perhaps they will be mindful.

ayah_ar: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Or have they taken others besides Allah as intercessors? Say, O Prophet, Would they do so, even though those idols have neither authority nor intelligence?

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُ ٱشۡمَأَزَّتۡ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Yet when Allah alone is mentioned, the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are filled with disgust. But as soon as those gods other than Him are mentioned, they are filled with joy.

ayah_ar: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And the evil consequences of their deeds will unfold before them, and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

ayah_ar: أَن تَقُولَ نَفۡسٞ يَٰحَسۡرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِي جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّٰخِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so that no sinful soul will say on Judgment Day, Woe to me for neglecting my duties towards Allah, while ridiculing the truth.

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: This is the truth, yet the disbelievers are entrenched in arrogance and opposition.

ayah_ar: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: Has he reduced all the gods to One God? Indeed, this is something totally astonishing.

ayah_ar: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Or is it because they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lordthe Almighty, the Giver of all bounties.

ayah_ar: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Or is it because the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between belongs to them? Let them then climb their way to heaven, if their claim is true.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Before them, the people of Noah denied the truth, as did ad, Pharaoh of the mighty structures,

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: These pagans are awaiting nothing but a single Blast that cannot be stopped.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: They say mockingly, Our Lord! Hasten for us our share of the punishment before the Day of Reckoning.

ayah_ar: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
label: anger
ayah_en: He ordered, Bring them back to me! Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.

ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and others bound together in chains.

ayah_ar: جَهَنَّمَ يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
label: anger
ayah_en: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil place to rest!

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَلۡيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٞ وَغَسَّاقٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: Let them then taste this: boiling water and oozing pus,

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: The misleaders will say to one another, Here is a crowd of followers being thrown in with us. They are not welcome, for they too will burn in the Fire.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ
label: anger
ayah_en: The followers will respond, No! You are not welcome! You brought this upon us. What an evil place for settlement!

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدۡهُ عَذَابٗا ضِعۡفٗا فِي ٱلنَّارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Adding, Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, double their punishment in the Fire.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: The tyrants will ask one another, But why do we not see those we considered to be lowly?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: This dispute between the residents of the Fire will certainly come to pass.

ayah_ar: فَسَجَدَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: So the angels prostrated all together

ayah_ar: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but not Iblis, becoming unfaithful.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Allah asked, O Iblis! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you just become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: He replied, I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: Allah commanded, Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Satan said, By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all,

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱلۡحَقُّ وَٱلۡحَقَّ أَقُولُ
label: anger
ayah_en: Allah concluded, The truth isand I only say the truth:

ayah_ar: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: We have never heard of this in the previous faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.

ayah_ar: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Remember when the welltrained, swift horses were paraded before him in the evening.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And indeed, We tested Solomon, placing a deformed body on his throne, then he turned to Allah in repentance.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَاۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: That is that. And the transgressors will certainly have the worst destination:

ayah_ar: قُلۡ هُوَ نَبَؤٌاْ عَظِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, This Quran is momentous news,

ayah_ar: وَلَتَعۡلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعۡدَ حِينِۭ
label: fear
ayah_en: And you will certainly know its truth before long.

ayah_ar: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: Be patient O Prophet with what they say. And remember Our servant, David, the man of strength. Indeed, he constantly turned to Allah.

ayah_ar: وَٱلطَّيۡرَ مَحۡشُورَةٗۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: And We subjected the birds, flocking together. All turned to him echoing his hymns.

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
label: joy
ayah_en: This is a blessed Book which We have revealed to you O Prophet so that they may contemplate its verses, and people of reason may be mindful.

ayah_ar: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: And We blessed David with Solomonwhat an excellent servant he was! Indeed, he constantly turned to Allah.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: Allah said, This is Our gift, so give or withhold as you wish, never to be called to account.

ayah_ar: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: We responded, Stomp your foot: now here is a cool and refreshing spring for washing and drinking.

ayah_ar: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
label: joy
ayah_en: And We gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for people of reason.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمۡ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡطَفَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ
label: joy
ayah_en: And in Our sight they are truly among the chosen and the finest.

ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖ مُّفَتَّحَةٗ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبُ
label: joy
ayah_en: the Gardens of Eternity, whose gates will be open for them.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: joy
ayah_en: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
label: joy
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, I am only a warner. And there is no god worthy of worship except Allahthe One, the Supreme.

ayah_ar: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ
label: joy
ayah_en: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in betweenthe Almighty, Most Forgiving.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنۡهُمُ ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: except Your chosen servants among them.

ayah_ar: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Each rejected their messenger, so My punishment was justified.

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَقَدۡ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبۡغِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٞ مَّا هُمۡۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّٰهُ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّۤ رَاكِعٗاۤ وَأَنَابَ۩
label: sadness
ayah_en: David eventually ruled, He has definitely wronged you in demanding to add your sheep to his. And certainly many partners wrong each other, except those who believe and do goodbut how few are they! Then David realized that We had tested him so he asked for his Lords forgiveness, fell down in prostration, and turned to Him in repentance.

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَحۡبَبۡتُ حُبَّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتۡ بِٱلۡحِجَابِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He then proclaimed, I am truly in love with these fine things out of remembrance for Allah, until they went out of sight.

ayah_ar: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And remember Our servant Job, when he cried out to his Lord, Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering.

ayah_ar: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And say, I had no knowledge of the highest assembly in heaven when they differed concerning Adam.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, I do not ask you for any reward for this Quran, nor do I pretend to be someone I am not.

ayah_ar: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٖ لَّازِبِۭ
label: anger
ayah_en: So ask them O Prophet, which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation?

ayah_ar: بَلۡ عَجِبۡتَ وَيَسۡخَرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: In fact, you are astonished by their denial, while they ridicule you.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يَسۡتَسۡخِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And whenever they see a sign, they make fun of it,

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Surely on that Day they will all share in the punishment.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: That is certainly how We deal with the wicked.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: For whenever it was said to them in the world, There is no god worthy of worship except Allah, they acted arrogantly

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ
label: anger
ayah_en: and argued, Should we really abandon our gods for a mad poet?

ayah_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We have surely made it a test for the wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Indeed, it is a tree that grows in the depths of Hell,

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: The evildoers will certainly be left to eat from it, filling up their bellies with it.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمۡ أَلۡفَوۡاْ ءَابَآءَهُمۡ ضَآلِّينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Indeed, they found their forefathers astray,

ayah_ar: أَئِفۡكًا ءَالِهَةٗ دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Is it false gods that you desire instead of Allah?

ayah_ar: أَتَدۡعُونَ بَعۡلٗا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡخَٰلِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Do you call upon the idol of Bal and abandon the Best of Creators

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمۡ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?

ayah_ar: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Ask them O Prophet if your Lord has daughters, while the pagans prefer to have sons.

ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ تَحۡكُمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

ayah_ar: فَأۡتُواْ بِكِتَٰبِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then bring us your scripture, if what you say is true!

ayah_ar: فَكَفَرُواْ بِهِۦۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: But now they reject it, so they will soon know.

ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: So turn away from the deniers for a while O Prophet.

ayah_ar: وَحِفۡظٗا مِّن كُلِّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّارِدٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: and for protection from every rebellious devil.

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: They cannot listen to the highest assembly of angels for they are pelted from every side,

ayah_ar: ۞ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Allah will say to the angels, Gather all the wrongdoers along with their peers, and whatever they used to worship

ayah_ar: وَقِفُوهُمۡۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسۡـُٔولُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And detain them, for they must be questioned.

ayah_ar: بَلۡ هُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مُسۡتَسۡلِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: In fact, on that Day they will be fully submissive.

ayah_ar: إِنَّكُمۡ لَذَآئِقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَلِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: You will certainly taste the painful torment,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

ayah_ar: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِي سَوَآءِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then he and the others will look and spot him in the midst of the Hellfire.

ayah_ar: طَلۡعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: bearing fruit like devils heads.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then on top of that they will be given a blend of boiling drink.

ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: See then what was the end of those who had been warned.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلۡأٓخَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then We drowned the others.

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: then said, I am really sick.

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: when it is Allah Who created you and whatever you do?

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: They said to one another, Build him a furnace and cast him into the blazing fire.

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ أَسۡلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلۡجَبِينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then when they submitted to Allahs Will, and Abraham laid him on the side of his forehead for sacrifice,

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمۡ لَوَٰحِدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Surely your God is One!

ayah_ar: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven with the stars for decoration

ayah_ar: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: They will turn on each other, throwing blame.

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: They will have a known provision:

ayah_ar: فَوَٰكِهُ وَهُم مُّكۡرَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: fruits of every type. And they will be honoured

ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: facing each other on thrones.

ayah_ar: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِكَأۡسٖ مِّن مَّعِينِۭ
label: joy
ayah_en: A drink of pure wine will be passed around to them from a flowing stream:

ayah_ar: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: It will neither harm them, nor will they be intoxicated by it.

ayah_ar: وَعِندَهُمۡ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ عِينٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and gorgeous eyes,

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I too would have certainly been among those brought to Hell.

ayah_ar: لِمِثۡلِ هَٰذَا فَلۡيَعۡمَلِ ٱلۡعَٰمِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: For such honour all should strive.

ayah_ar: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Is this bliss a better accommodation or the tree of Zaqqm?

ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: We delivered him and his family from the great distress,

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Indeed, this is how We reward the gooddoers.

ayah_ar: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: What then do you expect from the Lord of all worlds?

ayah_ar: فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ حَلِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: So We gave him good news of a forbearing son.

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: This is how We reward the gooddoers.

ayah_ar: وَبَشَّرۡنَٰهُ بِإِسۡحَٰقَ نَبِيّٗا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: We later gave him good news of Isaaca prophet, and one of the righteous.

ayah_ar: وَبَٰرَكۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسۡحَٰقَۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحۡسِنٞ وَظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ مُبِينٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: We blessed him and Isaac as well. Some of their descendants did good, while others clearly wronged themselves.

ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُمَا وَقَوۡمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and delivered them and their people from the great distress.

ayah_ar: وَنَصَرۡنَٰهُمۡ فَكَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: We helped them so it was they who prevailed.

ayah_ar: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and guided them to the Straight Path.

ayah_ar: إِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Remember when We delivered him and all of his family,

ayah_ar: وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ شَجَرَةٗ مِّن يَقۡطِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: and caused a squash plant to grow over him.

ayah_ar: فَـَٔامَنُواْ فَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: who then believed in him, so We allowed them enjoyment for a while.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and that Our forces will certainly prevail.

ayah_ar: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Glorified is your Lordthe Lord of Honour and Powerabove what they claim!

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And praise be to AllahLord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: دُحُورٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ وَاصِبٌ
label: sadness
ayah_en: fiercely driven away. And they will suffer an everlasting torment.

ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمۡ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Then they will be asked, What is the matter with you that you can no longer help each other?

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ بَل لَّمۡ تَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: The misleaders will reply, No! You disbelieved on your own.

ayah_ar: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: The decree of our Lord has come to pass against us all: we will certainly taste the punishment.

ayah_ar: فَأَغۡوَيۡنَٰكُمۡ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَٰوِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: We caused you to deviate, for we ourselves were deviant.

ayah_ar: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرۡدِينِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He will then say, By Allah! You nearly ruined me.

ayah_ar: فَهُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ يُهۡرَعُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so they rushed in their footsteps!

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ ضَلَّ قَبۡلَهُمۡ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And surely most of the earlier generations had strayed before them,

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٞ فَلَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمُجِيبُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, Noah cried out to Us, and how excellent are We in responding!

ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ مُدۡبِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So they turned their backs on him and went away.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He later said, I am leaving in obedience to my Lord. He will guide me.

ayah_ar: وَفَدَيۡنَٰهُ بِذِبۡحٍ عَظِيمٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice,

ayah_ar: إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Remember when he said to his people, Will you not fear Allah?

ayah_ar: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُدۡحَضِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Then to save it from sinking, he drew straws with other passengers. He lost and was thrown overboard.

ayah_ar: فَٱلۡتَقَمَهُ ٱلۡحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Then the whale engulfed him while he was blameworthy.

ayah_ar: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he would have certainly remained in its belly until the Day of Resurrection.

ayah_ar: ۞فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: But We cast him onto the open shore, totally worn out,

ayah_ar: أَصۡطَفَى ٱلۡبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلۡبَنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

ayah_ar: وَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And turn away from them for a while.

ayah_ar: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: The decree of torment has already been justified against most of them, for they will never believe.

ayah_ar: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمُ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِثٖ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُم مُّرۡسَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We sent them two messengers, but they rejected both. So We reinforced the two with a third, and they declared, We have indeed been sent to you as messengers.

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then from the farthest end of the city a man came, rushing. He advised, O my people! Follow the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: All it took was one mighty blast, and they were extinguished at once.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Have the deniers not considered how many peoples We destroyed before them who never came back to life again?

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not have any sense?

ayah_ar: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Burn in it Today for your disbelief.

ayah_ar: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so that you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, and so are heedless.

ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَيۡنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
label: fear
ayah_en: And our duty is only to deliver the message clearly.

ayah_ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: There is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, producing grain from it for them to eat.

ayah_ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: There is also a sign for them in the night: We strip from it daylight, thenbehold!they are in darkness.

ayah_ar: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: If We willed, We could drown them: then no one would respond to their cries, nor would they be rescued

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: And when it is said to them, Donate from what Allah has provided for you, the disbelievers say to the believers, Why should we feed those whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray!

ayah_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: The Trumpet will be blown a second time, thenbehold!they will rush from the graves to their Lord.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They will cry, Woe to us! Who has raised us up from our place of rest? This must be what the Most Compassionate warned us of; the messengers told the truth!

ayah_ar: وَأَنِ ٱعۡبُدُونِيۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: but to worship Me alone? This is the Straight Path.

ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: This is the Hell you were warned of.

ayah_ar: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: On this Day We will seal their mouths, their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And had We willed, We could have transfigured them on the spot, so they could neither progress forward nor turn back.

ayah_ar: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They cannot help the pagans, even though they serve the idols as dedicated guards.

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
label: fear
ayah_en: All it takes, when He wills something to be, is simply to say to it: Be! And it is!

ayah_ar: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: So glory be to the One in Whose Hands is the authority over all things, and to Whom alone you will all be returned.

ayah_ar: تَنزِيلَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: This is a revelation from the Almighty, Most Merciful,

ayah_ar: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: But they killed him, then he was told by the angels, Enter Paradise! He said, If only my people knew

ayah_ar: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: of how my Lord has forgiven me, and made me one of the honourable.

ayah_ar: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so that they may eat from its fruit, which they had no hand in making. Will they not then give thanks?

ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: The sun travels for its fixed term. That is the design of the Almighty, AllKnowing.

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for the moon, We have ordained precise phases for it, until it ends up like an old, curved palm stalk.

ayah_ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors with Noah in the fully loaded Ark,

ayah_ar: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves.

ayah_ar: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: They and their spouses will be in cool shade, reclining on canopied couches.

ayah_ar: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: There they will have fruits and whatever they desire.

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡلٗا مِّن رَّبّٖ رَّحِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: And Peace! will be their greeting from the Merciful Lord.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِينَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا فَهُمۡ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Do they not see that We singlehandedly created for them, among other things, cattle which are under their control?

ayah_ar: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?

ayah_ar: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: It is the same whether you warn them or notthey will never believe.

ayah_ar: إِنِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, I would then be clearly astray.

ayah_ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And whoever We grant a long life, We reverse them in development. Will they not then understand?

ayah_ar: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So do not let their words grieve you O Prophet. Indeed, We fully know what they conceal and what they reveal.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then I seized those who persisted in disbelief. How severe was My response!

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Indeed, Allah is the Knower of the unseen of the heavens and the earth. He surely knows best what is hidden in the heart.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَكَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعۡجِزَهُۥ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمٗا قَدِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those destroyed before them? They were far superior in might. But there is nothing that can escape Allah in the heavens or the earth. He is certainly AllKnowing, Most Capable.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ هَلۡ مِنۡ خَٰلِقٍ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: O humanity! Remember Allahs favours upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heavens and the earth? There is no god worthy of worship except Him. How can you then be deluded from the truth?

ayah_ar: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: And that is not difficult for Allah at all.

ayah_ar: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: so that He will reward them in full and increase them out of His grace. He is truly AllForgiving, Most Appreciative.

ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمۡ فِيهَا حَرِيرٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: They will enter the Gardens of Eternity, where they will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their clothing will be silk.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: And they will say, Praise be to Allah, Who has kept away from us all causes of sorrow. Our Lord is indeed AllForgiving, Most Appreciative.

ayah_ar: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: If you are rejected by them, so too were messengers before you. And to Allah all matters will be returned for judgment.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ فَٱتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّاۚ إِنَّمَا يَدۡعُواْ حِزۡبَهُۥ لِيَكُونُواْ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Surely Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy. He only invites his followers to become inmates of the Blaze.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: As for those who strive to discredit Our revelations, it is they who will suffer the worst torment of agonizing pain.

ayah_ar: فَأَعۡرَضُواْ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَيۡلَ ٱلۡعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلۡنَٰهُم بِجَنَّتَيۡهِمۡ جَنَّتَيۡنِ ذَوَاتَيۡ أُكُلٍ خَمۡطٖ وَأَثۡلٖ وَشَيۡءٖ مِّن سِدۡرٖ قَلِيلٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: But they turned away. So We sent against them a devastating flood, and replaced their orchards with two others producing bitter fruit, fruitless bushes,

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ
label: anger
ayah_en: This is how We rewarded them for their ingratitude. Would We ever punish anyone in such a way except the ungrateful?

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We have sent you O Prophet only as a deliverer of good news and a warner to all of humanity, but most people do not know.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Whenever We sent a warner to a society, its elite would say, We truly reject what you have been sent with.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Adding, We are far superior to the believers in wealth and children, and we will never be punished.

ayah_ar: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: while they had already rejected it before, guessing blindly from a place equally faraway from the Hereafter?

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُۥۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمۡ قَالُواْ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: No intercession will be of any benefit with Him, except by those granted permission by Him. At last, when the dread of Judgment Day is relieved from their hearts because they are permitted to intercede, they will excitedly ask the angels, What has your Lord just said? The angels will reply, The truth! And He is the Most High, AllGreat.

ayah_ar: قُل لَّكُم مِّيعَادُ يَوۡمٖ لَّا تَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ عَنۡهُ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا تَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, A Day has already been appointed for you, which you can neither delay nor advance by a single moment.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, Surely my Lord hurls the truth against falsehood. He is the Knower of all unseen.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, The truth has come, and falsehood will vanish, never to return.

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: If only you could see when they will be horrified with no escape on Judgment Day! And they will be seized from a nearby place.

ayah_ar: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: So He may reward those who believe and do good. It is they who will have forgiveness and an honourable provision.

ayah_ar: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: instructing: Make fulllength armour, perfectly balancing the links. And work righteousness O family of David!. Indeed, I am AllSeeing of what you do.

ayah_ar: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَشِمَالٖۖ كُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥۚ بَلۡدَةٞ طَيِّبَةٞ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, there was a sign for the tribe of Sheba in their homeland: two orchardsone to the right and the other to the left. They were told: Eat from the provision of your Lord, and be grateful to Him. Yours is a good land and a forgiving Lord.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, Iblis assumption about them has come true, so they all follow him, except a group of true believers.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: They will then cry, We do now believe in it all. But how could they possibly attain faith from a place so faroff from the world,

ayah_ar: وَحِيلَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ مَا يَشۡتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشۡيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبۡلُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ فِي شَكّٖ مُّرِيبِۭ
label: sadness
ayah_en: They will be sealed off from whatever they desire, as was done to their counterparts before. Indeed, they were all in alarming doubt.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord. Surely Allah is AllAware of what you all do.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Surely those who offend Allah are condemned by Allah in this world and the Hereafter. And He has prepared for them a humiliating punishment.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ فَقَدِ ٱحۡتَمَلُواْ بُهۡتَٰنٗا وَإِثۡمٗا مُّبِينٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: As for those who abuse believing men and women unjustifiably, they will definitely bear the guilt of slander and blatant sin.

ayah_ar: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Our Lord! Give them double our punishment, and condemn them tremendously.

ayah_ar: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Then and there the believers were put to the test, and were violently shaken.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: They had already pledged to Allah earlier never to turn their backs in retreat. And a pledge to Allah must be answered for.

ayah_ar: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Fleeing will not benefit you if you try to escape a natural or violent death. If it is not your time, you will only be allowed enjoyment for a little while.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Ask them, O  Prophet, Who can put you out of Allahs reach if He intends to harm you or show you mercy? They can never find any protector or helper besides Allah.

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Overlook their annoyances, and put your trust in Allah. For Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

ayah_ar: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Whether you reveal something or conceal it, surely Allah has perfect knowledge of all things.

ayah_ar: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
label: fear
ayah_en: People ask you O Prophet about the Hour. Say, That knowledge is only with Allah. You never know, perhaps the Hour is near.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: O  believers! Be mindful of Allah, and say what is right.

ayah_ar: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Indeed, in the Messenger of Allah you have an excellent example for whoever has hope in Allah and the Last Day, and remembers Allah often.

ayah_ar: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: But if you desire Allah and His Messenger and the everlasting Home of the Hereafter, then Surely Allah has prepared a great reward for those of you who do good.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: That is His way with those prophets who deliver the messages of Allah, and consider Him, and none but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as a vigilant Reckoner.

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَلِّي عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَحِيمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: He is the One Who showers His blessings upon youand His angels pray for youso that He may bring you out of darkness and into light. For He is ever Merciful to the believers.

ayah_ar: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Their greeting on the Day they meet Him will be, Peace! And He has prepared for them an honourable reward.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: O Prophet! We have sent you as a witness, and a deliverer of good news, and a warner,

ayah_ar: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and a caller to the Way of Allah by His command, and a beacon of light.

ayah_ar: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Give good news to the believers that they will have a great bounty from Allah.

ayah_ar: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: That was Allahs way with those hypocrites who have gone before. And you will find no change in Allahs way.

ayah_ar: يُصۡلِحۡ لَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدۡ فَازَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا
label: joy
ayah_en: He will bless your deeds for you, and forgive your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger, has truly achieved a great triumph.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: O Prophet! Always be mindful of Allah, and do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is AllKnowing, AllWise.

ayah_ar: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: Always remember what is recited in your homes of Allahs revelations and prophetic wisdom. Surely Allah is Most Subtle, AllAware.

ayah_ar: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: to stay there for ever and evernever will they find any protector or helper.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠
label: sadness
ayah_en: On the Day their faces are constantly flipped in the Fire, they will cry, Oh! If only we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
label: sadness
ayah_en: And they will say, Our Lord! We obeyed our leaders and elite, but they led us astray from the Right Way.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدِۭۚ بَلۡ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Still they ask mockingly, When we are disintegrated into the earth, will we really be raised as a new creation? In fact, they are in denial of the meeting with their Lord.

ayah_ar: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We will certainly make them taste some of the minor torment in this life before the major torment of the Hereafter, so perhaps they will return to the Right Path.

ayah_ar: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ثُمَّ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَآۚ إِنَّا مِنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُنتَقِمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And who does more wrong than the one who is reminded of Allahs revelations then turns away from them? We will surely inflict punishment upon the wicked.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then He fashioned them and had a spirit of His Own creation breathed into them. And He gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. Yet you hardly give any thanks.

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Had We willed, We could have easily imposed guidance on every soul. But My Word will come to pass: I will surely fill up Hell with jinn and humans all together.

ayah_ar: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَٰكُمۡۖ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: So taste the punishment for neglecting the meeting of this Day of yours. We too will certainly neglect you. And taste the torment of eternity for what you used to do!

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: That is the Knower of the seen and unseenthe Almighty, Most Merciful,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: Who has perfected everything He created. And He originated the creation of humankind from clay.

ayah_ar: فَلَا تَعۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أُخۡفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعۡيُنٖ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: No soul can imagine what delights are kept in store for them as a reward for what they used to do.

ayah_ar: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who believe and do good, they will have the Gardens of Eternal Residenceas an accommodation for what they used to do.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Then He made his descendants from an extract of a humble fluid,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا وَلَّىٰ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَا كَأَنَّ فِيٓ أُذُنَيۡهِ وَقۡرٗاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they turn away in arrogance as if they did not hear them, as if there is deafness in their ears. So give them good news O Prophet of a painful punishment.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: This is Allahs creation. Now show Me what those gods other than Him have created. In fact, the wrongdoers are clearly astray.

ayah_ar: يَٰبُنَيَّ إِنَّهَآ إِن تَكُ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٖ فَتَكُن فِي صَخۡرَةٍ أَوۡ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَوۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَأۡتِ بِهَا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: Luqman  added, O my dear son! Even if a deed were the weight of a mustard seedbe it hidden in a rock or in the heavens or the earthAllah will bring it forth. Surely Allah is Most Subtle, AllAware.

ayah_ar: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ كُفۡرُهُۥٓۚ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ فَنُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: But whoever disbelieves, do not let their disbelief grieve you O Prophet. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of all they did. Surely Allah knows best what is hidden in the heart.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: Do you not see that the ships sail smoothly through the sea by the grace of Allah so that He may show you some of His signs? Surely in this are signs for whoever is steadfast, grateful.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Surely those who believe and do good will have the Gardens of Bliss,

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Indeed, We blessed Luqman with wisdom, saying, Be grateful to Allah, for whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good. And whoever is ungrateful, then surely Allah is SelfSufficient, Praiseworthy.

ayah_ar: ۞وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَقَدِ ٱسۡتَمۡسَكَ بِٱلۡعُرۡوَةِ ٱلۡوُثۡقَىٰۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Whoever fully submits themselves to Allah and is a gooddoer, they have certainly grasped the firmest handhold. And with Allah rests the outcome of all affairs.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ أَن كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُواْ بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then most evil was the end of the evildoers for denying and mocking the signs of Allah.

ayah_ar: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: There will be no intercessors for them from among their associategods, and they will totally deny their associategods.

ayah_ar: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: all praise is for Him in the heavens and the earthas well as in the afternoon, and at noon.

ayah_ar: مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُواْ دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: like those who have divided their faith and split into sects, each rejoicing in what they have.

ayah_ar: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: So on that Day the wrongdoers excuses will not benefit them, nor will they be allowed to appease their Lord.

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: This is how Allah seals the hearts of those unwilling to know the truth.

ayah_ar: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They only know the worldly affairs of this life, but are totally oblivious to the Hereafter.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: It is Allah Who originates the creation, and will resurrect it. And then to Him you will all be returned.

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُبۡلِسُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: On the Day the Hour will arrive, the wicked will be dumbstruck.

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَفَرَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And on the Day the Hour will arrive, the people will then be split into two groups.

ayah_ar: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: becoming ungrateful for whatever favours We have given them. So enjoy yourselves, for soon you will know.

ayah_ar: مَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِأَنفُسِهِمۡ يَمۡهَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: those who disbelieved will bear the burden of their own disbelief; and those who did good will have prepared for themselves eternal homes,

ayah_ar: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: within three to nine years. The whole matter rests with Allah before and after victory. And on that day the believers will rejoice

ayah_ar: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: at the victory willed by Allah. He gives victory to whoever He wills. For He is the Almighty, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who believed and did good, they will be rejoicing in a Garden.

ayah_ar: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So glorify Allah in the evening and in the morning

ayah_ar: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا لِّتَسۡكُنُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَكُم مَّوَدَّةٗ وَرَحۡمَةًۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And one of His signs is that He created for you spouses from among yourselves so that you may find comfort in them. And He has placed between you compassion and mercy. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

ayah_ar: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ خَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡوَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡعَٰلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And one of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the diversity of your languages and colours. Surely in this are signs for those of sound knowledge.

ayah_ar: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ مَنَامُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَٱبۡتِغَآؤُكُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And one of His signs is your sleep by night and by day for rest as well as your seeking His bounty in both. Surely in this are signs for people who listen.

ayah_ar: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so that He may generously reward those who believe and do good, out of His grace. He truly does not like the disbelievers.

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And as for those who disbelieved, and denied Our signs and the meeting with Allah in the Hereafter, they will be confined in punishment.

ayah_ar: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Corruption has spread on land and sea as a result of what peoples hands have done, so that Allah may cause them to taste the consequences of some of their deeds and perhaps they might return to the Right Path.

ayah_ar: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: although they had utterly lost hope just before it was sent down to them.

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَانُواْ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And on the Day the Hour will arrive, the wicked will swear that they did not stay in this world more than an hour. In this way they were always deluded in the world.

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So be patient, for the promise of Allah certainly is true. And do not be disturbed by those who have no sure faith.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَئِسُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَتِي وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: As for those who disbelieve in Allahs signs and the meeting with Him, it is they who will have no hope in His mercy. And it is they who will suffer a painful punishment.

ayah_ar: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And remember when Lot rebuked the men of his people: You certainly commit a shameful deed that no man has ever done before you.

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: But they rejected him, so an overwhelming earthquake struck them and they fell lifeless in their homes.

ayah_ar: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِ ٱتَّخَذَتۡ بَيۡتٗاۖ وَإِنَّ أَوۡهَنَ ٱلۡبُيُوتِ لَبَيۡتُ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: The parable of those who take protectors other than Allah is that of a spider spinning a shelter. And the flimsiest of all shelters is certainly that of a spider, if only they knew.

ayah_ar: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: But this Quran is a set of clear revelations preserved in the hearts of those gifted with knowledge. And none denies Our revelations except the stubborn wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: If they happen to be aboard a ship caught in a storm, they cry out to Allah alone in sincere devotion. But as soon as He delivers them safely to shore, they associate others with Him once again.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: We certainly tested those before them. And in this way Allah will clearly distinguish between those who are truthful and those who are liars.

ayah_ar: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Or do the evildoers simply think that they will escape Us? How wrong is their judgment!

ayah_ar: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Whoever hopes for the meeting with Allah, let them know that Allahs appointed time is sure to come. He is the AllHearing, AllKnowing.

ayah_ar: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And whoever strives in Allahs cause, only does so for their own good. Surely Allah is not in need of any of His creation.

ayah_ar: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Yet they will certainly be made to carry their own burdens, as well as other burdens along with their own. And they will surely be questioned on Judgment Day about what they used to fabricate.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: Have they not seen how Allah originates the creation then resurrects it? That is certainly easy for Allah.

ayah_ar: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: He punishes whoever He wills, and shows mercy to whoever He wills. And you will all be returned to Him.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡهَآ ءَايَةَۢ بَيِّنَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And We did leave some of its ruins as a clear lesson for people of understanding.

ayah_ar: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And Hell will certainly encompass the disbelievers

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَغۡشَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: on the Day the punishment will overwhelm them from above them and from below their feet. And it will be said, Reap what you sowed.

ayah_ar: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Every soul will taste death, then to Us you will all be returned.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who believe and do good, We will certainly absolve them of their sins, and reward them according to the best of what they used to do.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Those who believe and do good will surely be admitted by Us into the company of the righteous.

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: But We delivered him and those in the Ark, making it a sign for all people.

ayah_ar: ٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۖ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ تَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِۗ وَلَذِكۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَصۡنَعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, genuine prayer should deter one from indecency and wickedness. The remembrance of Allah is an even greater deterrent. And Allah fully knows what you all do.

ayah_ar: يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ أَرۡضِي وَٰسِعَةٞ فَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
label: joy
ayah_en: O My believing servants! My earth is truly spacious, so worship Me alone.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who patiently endure, and put their trust in their Lord!

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills of His servants. Surely Allah has full knowledge of everything.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who struggle in Our cause, We will surely guide them along Our Way. And Allah is certainly with the gooddoers.

ayah_ar: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Allah will certainly distinguish between those who have sure faith and the hypocrites.

ayah_ar: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: If you Meccans persist in denial, so did many communities before you. The Messengers duty is only to deliver the message clearly.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Lot prayed, My Lord! Help me against the people of corruption.

ayah_ar: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And when he reached full strength and maturity, We gave him wisdom and knowledge. This is how We reward the gooddoers.

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: So We seized him and his soldiers, casting them into the sea. See then what was the end of the wrongdoers!

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We made them leaders inviting others to the Fire. And on the Day of Judgment they will not be helped.

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةِۭ بَطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَاۖ فَتِلۡكَ مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡكَن مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ وَكُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Imagine how many societies We have destroyed that had been spoiled by their comfortable living! Those are their residences, never inhabited after them except passingly. And We alone were the Successor.

ayah_ar: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَحۡذَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and to establish them in the land; and through them show Pharaoh, Haman,

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: He pleaded, My Lord! I have definitely wronged my soul, so forgive me. So He forgave him, for He is indeed the AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: So Moses left the city in a state of fear and caution, praying, My Lord! Deliver me from the wrongdoing people.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَمَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتُهَاۚ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Whatever pleasure you have been given is no more than a fleeting enjoyment and adornment of this worldly life. But what is with Allah is far better and more lasting. Will you not then understand?

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And watch for the Day He will call to them, asking, What response did you give to the messengers?

ayah_ar: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They will be too dumbstruck on that Day to ask one another for answers.

ayah_ar: وَرَبُّكَ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيَخۡتَارُۗ مَا كَانَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Your Lord creates and chooses whatever He willsthe choice is not theirs. Glorified and Exalted is Allah above what they associate with Him!

ayah_ar: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they reveal.

ayah_ar: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: You never expected this Book to be revealed to you, but it came only as a mercy from your Lord. So never side with the disbelievers in their disbelief.

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And do not invoke any other god with Allah. There is no god worthy of worship except Him. Everything is bound to perish except He Himself. All authority belongs to Him. And to Him you will all be returned.

ayah_ar: فَرَدَدۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّهِۦ كَيۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَ وَلِتَعۡلَمَ أَنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: This is how We returned him to his mother so that her heart would be put at ease, and not grieve, and that she would know that Allahs promise is always true. But most people do not know.

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: You surely cannot guide whoever you like O Prophet, but it is Allah Who guides whoever He wills, and He knows best who are fit to be guided.

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who repent, believe, and do good in this world, it is right to hope that they will be among the successful.

ayah_ar: نَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: We narrate to you O Prophet part of the story of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for people who believe.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And she said to his sister, Keep track of him! So she watched him from a distance, while they were unaware.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Moses pledged, My Lord! For all Your favours upon me, I will never side with the wicked.

ayah_ar: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And as he made his way towards Midian, he said, I trust my Lord will guide me to the right way.

ayah_ar: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So he watered their herd for them, then withdrew to the shade and prayed, My Lord! I am truly in desperate need of whatever provision You may have in store for me.

ayah_ar: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: We caused a curse to follow them in this world. And on the Day of Judgment they will be among the outcasts.

ayah_ar: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَاۖ وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجۡزَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Whoever comes with a good deed will be rewarded with what is better. And whoever comes with an evil deed, then the evildoers will only be rewarded for what they used to do.

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Do not let them turn you away from the revelations of Allah after they have been sent down to you. Rather, invite all to the Way of your Lord, and never be one of the polytheists.

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: It is they who will suffer a dreadful torment, and in the Hereafter they will truly be the greatest losers.

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: But when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, This is pure magic.

ayah_ar: وَجَحَدُواْ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَيۡقَنَتۡهَآ أَنفُسُهُمۡ ظُلۡمٗا وَعُلُوّٗاۚ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And, although their hearts were convinced the signs were true, they still denied them wrongfully and arrogantly. See then what was the end of the corruptors!

ayah_ar: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًا أَوۡ لَأَاْذۡبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوۡ لَيَأۡتِيَنِّي بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: I will surely subject him to a severe punishment, or even slaughter him, unless he brings me a compelling excuse.

ayah_ar: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And there were in the city nine elite men who spread corruption in the land, never doing what is right.

ayah_ar: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And so they made a plan, but We too made a plan, while they were unaware.

ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ مَكۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّا دَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ وَقَوۡمَهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: See then what the consequences of their plan were: We utterly destroyed them and their people all together.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Surely your Lord is ever Bountiful to humanity, but most of them are ungrateful.

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ فَوۡجٗا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Watch for the Day We will gather from every faithcommunity a group of those who denied Our revelations, and they will be driven in ranks.

ayah_ar: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And whoever comes with an evil deed will be hurled facefirst into the Fire. Are you rewarded except for what you used to do?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have certainly made their evil deeds appealing to them, so they wander blindly.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Travel throughout the land and see the fate of the wicked.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Perhaps some of what you seek to hasten is close at hand.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And surely your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they reveal.

ayah_ar: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: For there is nothing hidden in the heavens or the earth without being written in a perfect Record.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Your Lord will certainly judge between them by His justice, for He is the Almighty, AllKnowing.

ayah_ar: هُدٗى وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: It is a guide and good news for the believers:

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who establish prayer, pay almstax, and have sure faith in the Hereafter.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: And indeed, you O Prophet are receiving the Quran from the One Who is AllWise, AllKnowing.

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِيَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: But when he came to it, he was called by Allah, Blessed is the one at the fire, and whoever is around it! Glory be to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: O  Moses! It is truly I. I am Allahthe Almighty, AllWise.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسۡنَۢا بَعۡدَ سُوٓءٖ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Fear is only for those who do wrong. But if they later mend their evil ways with good, then I am certainly AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Solomons forces of jinn, humans, and birds were rallied for him, perfectly organized.

ayah_ar: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكٗا مِّن قَوۡلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَدۡخِلۡنِي بِرَحۡمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So Solomon smiled in amusement at her words, and prayed, My Lord! Inspire me to always be thankful for Your favours which You have blessed me and my parents with, and to do good deeds that please you. Admit me, by Your mercy, into the company of Your righteous servants.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
label: joy
ayah_en: He is Allah! There is no god worthy of worship except Him, the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Solomon asked, O chiefs! Which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in full submission?
