ayah_ar: قَالَ عِفۡرِيتٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَۖ وَإِنِّي عَلَيۡهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمِينٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: One mighty jinn responded, I can bring it to you before you rise from this council of yours. And I am quite strong and trustworthy for this task.

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلَّذِي عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَرۡتَدَّ إِلَيۡكَ طَرۡفُكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسۡتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضۡلِ رَبِّي لِيَبۡلُوَنِيٓ ءَأَشۡكُرُ أَمۡ أَكۡفُرُۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّي غَنِيّٞ كَرِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: But the one who had knowledge of the Scripture said, I can bring it to you in the blink of an eye. So when Solomon saw it placed before him, he exclaimed, This is by the grace of my Lord to test me whether I am grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good. But whoever is ungrateful, surely my Lord is SelfSufficient, Most Generous.

ayah_ar: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدۡخُلِي ٱلصَّرۡحَۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتۡهُ حَسِبَتۡهُ لُجَّةٗ وَكَشَفَتۡ عَن سَاقَيۡهَاۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرۡحٞ مُّمَرَّدٞ مِّن قَوَارِيرَۗ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي وَأَسۡلَمۡتُ مَعَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Then she was told, Enter the palace. But when she saw the hall, she thought it was a body of water, so she bared her legs. Solomon said. It is just a palace paved with crystal. At last she declared, My Lord! I have certainly wronged my soul. Now I fully submit myself along with Solomon to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
label: joy
ayah_en: So put your trust in Allah, for you are surely upon the Path of clear truth.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِيَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Do they not see that We made the night for them to rest in and the day bright? Surely in this are signs for those who believe.

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city of Mecca, Who has made it sacred, and to Him belongs everything. And I am commanded to be one of those who fully submit to Him,

ayah_ar: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَتَعۡرِفُونَهَاۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And say, All praise is for Allah! He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is never unaware of what you do.

ayah_ar: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, I found a woman ruling over them, who has been given everything she needs, and who has a magnificent throne.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He urged the disbelieving group, O my people! Why do you seek to hasten the torment If only you sought Allahs forgiveness so you may be shown mercy!

ayah_ar: فَتِلۡكَ بُيُوتُهُمۡ خَاوِيَةَۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So their homes are there, but completely ruined because of their wrongdoing. Surely in this is a lesson for people of knowledge.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Nor can you lead the blind out of their misguidance. You can make none hear the truth except those who believe in Our revelations, fully submitting to Allah.

ayah_ar: وَأَنۡ أَتۡلُوَاْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and to recite the Quran. Then whoever chooses to be guided, it is only for their own good. But whoever chooses to stray, say, O Prophet, I am only a warner.

ayah_ar: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They have certainly denied the truth, so they will soon face the consequences of their ridicule.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

ayah_ar: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
label: anger
ayah_en: Also, they have a charge against me, so I fear they may kill me.

ayah_ar: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
label: anger
ayah_en: How can that be a favour, of which you remind me, when it was only because you have enslaved the Children of Israel?

ayah_ar: قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Pharaoh asked, And what is the Lord of all worlds?

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Pharaoh threatened, If you take any other god besides me, I will certainly have you imprisoned.

ayah_ar: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, He is indeed a skilled magician,

ayah_ar: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَٰتِ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: So the magicians were assembled at the set time on the appointed day.

ayah_ar: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so that we may follow the magicians if they prevail?

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلۡأٓخَرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then We drowned the others.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They replied, We worship idols, to which we are fully devoted.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They replied, No! But we found our forefathers doing the same.

ayah_ar: فَكُبۡكِبُواْ فِيهَا هُمۡ وَٱلۡغَاوُۥنَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then the idols will be hurled headlong into Hell, along with the deviant

ayah_ar: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَخۡلُدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and construct castles, as if you are going to live forever,

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They responded, It is all the same to us whether you warn us or not.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: who spread corruption throughout the land, never setting things right.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطٍ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: The people of Lot rejected the messengers

ayah_ar: أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلذُّكۡرَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Why do you men lust after fellow men,

ayah_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: leaving the wives that your Lord has created for you? In fact, you are a transgressing people.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأٓخَرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then We utterly destroyed the rest,

ayah_ar: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: pouring upon them a rain of brimstone. How evil was the rain of those who had been warned!

ayah_ar: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: So cause deadly pieces of the sky to fall upon us, if what you say is true.

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكۡنَٰهُ فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: This is how We allow denial to steep into the hearts of the wicked.

ayah_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Do they really seek to hasten Our torment?

ayah_ar: يُلۡقُونَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ كَٰذِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: who gives an attentive ear to halftruths, mostly passing on sheer lies.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Do you not see how they rant in every field,

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُمۡ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: only saying what they never do?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

ayah_ar: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then you did what you did, being utterly ungrateful!

ayah_ar: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: So he threw down his staff andbehold!it became a real snake.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: We really hope that our Lord will forgive our sins, as we are the first to believe.

ayah_ar: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Moses reassured them, Absolutely not! My Lord is certainly with meHe will guide me.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: And He is the One Who, I hope, will forgive my flaws on Judgment Day.

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُخۡزِنِي يَوۡمَ يُبۡعَثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And do not disgrace me on the Day all will be resurrected

ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِيمُ لِلۡغَاوِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the Hellfire will be displayed to the deviant.

ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: besides Allah? Can they help you or even help themselves?

ayah_ar: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Their judgment is with my Lord, if you had any sense!

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
label: fear
ayah_en: So We saved him and those with him in the fully loaded Ark.

ayah_ar: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: I truly fear for you the torment of a tremendous day.

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And do not follow the command of the transgressors,

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: And do not ever touch her with harm, or you will be overtaken by the torment of a tremendous day.

ayah_ar: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ نَٰدِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: But they killed her, becoming regretful.

ayah_ar: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي وَأَهۡلِي مِمَّا يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: My Lord! Save me and my family from the consequences of what they do.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأٓخَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Then We utterly destroyed the rest,

ayah_ar: وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Weigh with an even balance,

ayah_ar: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment,

ayah_ar: فَيَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: which will take them by surprise when they least expect it.

ayah_ar: ذِكۡرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: to remind them, for We would never wrong anyone.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Who sees you when you rise for prayer at night,

ayah_ar: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Shall I inform you of whom the devils actually descend upon?

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَنِي فَهُوَ يَهۡدِينِ
label: joy
ayah_en: He is the One Who created me, and He alone guides me.

ayah_ar: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: My Lord! Grant me wisdom, and join me with the righteous.

ayah_ar: وَٱجۡعَلۡنِي مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Make me one of those awarded the Garden of Bliss.

ayah_ar: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: On that Day Paradise will be brought near to the Godfearing,

ayah_ar: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So judge between me and them decisively, and save me and the believers with me.

ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: and gardens, and springs.

ayah_ar: فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So We saved him and all of his family,

ayah_ar: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
label: joy
ayah_en: which the trustworthy spirit Gabriel brought down

ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: into your heart O Prophetso that you may be one of the warners

ayah_ar: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Perhaps you O Prophet will grieve yourself to death over their disbelief.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

ayah_ar: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And so my heart will be broken and my tongue will be tied. So send Aaron along as a messenger.

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Moses replied, I did it then, lacking guidance.

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Pharaoh said mockingly, Your messenger, who has been sent to you, must be insane.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Moses responded: He is the Lord of the east and west, and everything in between, if only you had any sense.

ayah_ar: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَٰهُم مِّن جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: So We lured the tyrants out of their gardens, springs,

ayah_ar: قَالَ هَلۡ يَسۡمَعُونَكُمۡ إِذۡ تَدۡعُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Abraham asked, Can they hear you when you call upon them?

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: They are all enemies to me, except the Lord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Only those who come before Allah with a pure heart will be saved.

ayah_ar: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: By Allah! We were clearly mistaken,

ayah_ar: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَٰفِعِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Now we have none to intercede for us,

ayah_ar: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: If only we could have a second chance, then we would be believers.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this message. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this message. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

ayah_ar: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He responded, And what knowledge do I have of what they do?

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: I am not going to expel the believers.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي كَذَّبُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Noah prayed, My Lord! My people have truly rejected me.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Fear the One Who has provided you with the good things you know:

ayah_ar: أَتُتۡرَكُونَ فِي مَا هَٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Do you think you will be forever left secure in what you have here:

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Also, you are only a human being like us, and we think you are indeed a liar.

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ نَزَّلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَعۡجَمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Had We revealed it to a nonArab,

ayah_ar: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: would that enjoyment be of any benefit to them at all?

ayah_ar: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and be gracious to the believers who follow you.

ayah_ar: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: But if they disobey you, say, I am certainly free of what you do.

ayah_ar: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Once it sees them from a distance, they will hear it fuming and growling.

ayah_ar: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: They will be told, Do not cry only once for destruction, but cry many times over!

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: And beware of the Day the wrongdoer will bite his nails in regret and say, Oh! I wish I had followed the Way along with the Messenger!

ayah_ar: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
label: anger
ayah_en: Or do you think that most of them listen or understand?

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: We certainly disperse it among them so they may be mindful, but most people persist in ungratefulness.

ayah_ar: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: So do not yield to the disbelievers, but strive diligently against them with this Quran.

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا
label: anger
ayah_en: It is they who will be rewarded with elevated mansions in Paradise for their perseverance, and will be received with salutations and greetings of peace,

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ ٱكۡتَتَبَهَا فَهِيَ تُمۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: And they say, These revelations are only ancient fables which he has had written down, and they are rehearsed to him morning and evening.

ayah_ar: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلسَّاعَةِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
label: fear
ayah_en: In fact, they deny the Hour. And for the deniers of the Hour, We have prepared a blazing Fire.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Is this better or the Garden of Eternity which the righteous have been promised, as a reward and an ultimate destination?

ayah_ar: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا
label: fear
ayah_en: Then We will turn to whatever good deeds they did, reducing them to scattered dust.

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
label: fear
ayah_en: Watch for the Day the heavens will burst with clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive ranks.

ayah_ar: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡۗ وَكَانَ ٱلۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Yet they worship besides Allah what can neither benefit nor harm them. And the disbeliever always collaborates against their Lord.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: And We have sent you O Prophet only as a deliverer of good news and a warner.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلۡفَةٗ لِّمَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوۡ أَرَادَ شُكُورٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: And He is the One Who causes the day and the night to alternate, as a sign for whoever desires to be mindful or to be grateful.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
label: fear
ayah_en: They are those who pray, Our Lord! Keep the punishment of Hell away from us, for its punishment is indeed unrelenting.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتۡ مُسۡتَقَرّٗا وَمُقَامٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: It is certainly an evil place to settle and reside.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
label: fear
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, You all would not even matter to my Lord were it not for your faith in Him. But now you disbelievers have denied the truth, so the torment is bound to come.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, This Quran has been revealed by the One Who knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth. Surely He is AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: There they will have whatever they wish for, forever. That is a promise to be sought after, binding on your Lord.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنٗا ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Have you not seen how your Lord extends the shadeHe could have simply made it remain still if He so willedthen We make the sun its guide,

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: And He is the One Who sends the winds ushering in His mercy, and We send down pure rain from the sky,

ayah_ar: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: The true servants of the Most Compassionate are those who walk on the earth humbly, and when the foolish address them improperly, they only respond with peace.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمۡ سُجَّدٗا وَقِيَٰمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: They are those who spend a good portion of the night, prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُواْ لَمۡ يُسۡرِفُواْ وَلَمۡ يَقۡتُرُواْ وَكَانَ بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: They are those who spend neither wastefully nor stingily, but moderately in between.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ حَسَنَٰتٖۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who repent, believe, and do good deeds, they are the ones whose evil deeds Allah will change into good deeds. For Allah is AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: And when they are tossed into a narrow place inside Hell, chained together, then and there they will cry out for instant destruction.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: But on the Day they will see the angels, there will be no good news for the wicked, who will cry, Keep away! Away from us!

ayah_ar: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: Woe to me! I wish I had never taken soandso as a close friend.

ayah_ar: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: It was he who truly made me stray from the Reminder after it had reached me. And Satan has always betrayed humanity.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: The Messenger has cried, O my Lord! My people have indeed received this Quran with neglect.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحۡشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: Those who will be dragged into Hell on their faces will be in the worst place, and are now farthest from the Right Way.

ayah_ar: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: For each We set forth various lessons, and We ultimately destroyed each.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قَبَضۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡنَا قَبۡضٗا يَسِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: causing the shade to retreat gradually?

ayah_ar: لَّوۡلَآ إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ ظَنَّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتُ بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا وَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: If only the believing men and women had thought well of one another, when you heard this rumour, and said, This is clearly an outrageous slander!

ayah_ar: أَفِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ٱرۡتَابُوٓاْ أَمۡ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ بَلۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Is there a sickness in their hearts? Or are they in doubt? Or do they fear that Allah and His Messenger will be unjust to them? In fact, it is they who are the true wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: And Allah makes His commandments clear to you, for Allah is AllKnowing, AllWise.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَشۡهَدُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَلۡسِنَتُهُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: on the Day their tongues, hands, and feet will testify against them for what they used to do.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ كَسَرَابِۭ بِقِيعَةٖ يَحۡسَبُهُ ٱلظَّمۡـَٔانُ مَآءً حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَهُۥ لَمۡ يَجِدۡهُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَوَجَدَ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ فَوَفَّىٰهُ حِسَابَهُۥۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: fear
ayah_en: As for the disbelievers, their deeds are like a mirage in a desert, which the thirsty perceive as water, but when they approach it, they find it to be nothing. Instead, they find Allah there in the Hereafter, ready to settle their account. And Allah is swift in reckoning.

ayah_ar: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: But if the truth is in their favour, they come to him, fully submitting.

ayah_ar: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: Do not think O Prophet that the disbelievers can escape in the land. The Fire will be their home. Indeed, what an evil destination!

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: except those who repent afterwards and mend their ways, then surely Allah is AllForgiving, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: You would have suffered, had it not been for Allahs grace and mercy upon you, and had Allah not been Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: ۞ٱللَّهُ نُورُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ مَثَلُ نُورِهِۦ كَمِشۡكَوٰةٖ فِيهَا مِصۡبَاحٌۖ ٱلۡمِصۡبَاحُ فِي زُجَاجَةٍۖ ٱلزُّجَاجَةُ كَأَنَّهَا كَوۡكَبٞ دُرِّيّٞ يُوقَدُ مِن شَجَرَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٖ زَيۡتُونَةٖ لَّا شَرۡقِيَّةٖ وَلَا غَرۡبِيَّةٖ يَكَادُ زَيۡتُهَا يُضِيٓءُ وَلَوۡ لَمۡ تَمۡسَسۡهُ نَارٞۚ نُّورٌ عَلَىٰ نُورٖۚ يَهۡدِي ٱللَّهُ لِنُورِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَيَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ لِلنَّاسِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. His light whose oil would almost glow, even without being touched by fire. Light upon light! Allah guides whoever He wills to His light. And Allah sets forth parables for humanity. For Allah has perfect knowledge of all things.

ayah_ar: فِي بُيُوتٍ أَذِنَ ٱللَّهُ أَن تُرۡفَعَ وَيُذۡكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسۡمُهُۥ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ فِيهَا بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ
label: joy
ayah_en: That light shines through houses of worship which Allah has ordered to be raised, and where His Name is mentioned. He is glorified there morning and evening

ayah_ar: رِجَالٞ لَّا تُلۡهِيهِمۡ تِجَٰرَةٞ وَلَا بَيۡعٌ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِقَامِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءِ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِ يَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا تَتَقَلَّبُ فِيهِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ
label: joy
ayah_en: by men who are not distractedeither by buying or sellingfrom Allahs remembrance, or performing prayer, or paying almstax. They fear a Day when hearts and eyes will tremble,

ayah_ar: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: For whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger, and fears Allah and is mindful of Him, then it is they who will truly triumph.

ayah_ar: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: There is nothing beyond our worldly life. We die, others are born, and none will be resurrected.

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then the mighty blast overtook them with justice, and We reduced them to rubble. So away with the wrongdoing people!

ayah_ar: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They argued, Will we believe in two humans, like ourselves, whose people are slaves to us?

ayah_ar: فَذَرۡهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَتِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: So leave them O Prophet in their heedlessness for a while.

ayah_ar: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: But the hearts of those who disbelieve are oblivious to all of this, and they have other evil deeds, opposite to this, in which they are engrossed.

ayah_ar: مُسۡتَكۡبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَٰمِرٗا تَهۡجُرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: boasting of the Sacred House, and babbling nonsense about the Quran by night.

ayah_ar: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Is it because they have never contemplated the Word of Allah? Or because there has come to them something that did not come to their forefathers?

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They said, Once we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

ayah_ar: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Respond to evil with what is best. We know well what they claim.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They will cry, Our Lord! Our illfate took hold of us, so we became a misguided people.

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرِي وَكُنتُم مِّنۡهُمۡ تَضۡحَكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but you were so busy making fun of them that it made you forget My remembrance. And you used to laugh at them.

ayah_ar: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: He will say, You only remained for a little while, if only you knew.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: And indeed, We created humankind from an extract of clay,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: then placed each human as a spermdrop in a secure place,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: After that you will surely die,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ تُبۡعَثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then on the Day of Judgment you will be resurrected.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And indeed, We created above you seven levels of heaven. We are never unmindful of Our creation.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Surely in this are lessons. And We always put people to the test.

ayah_ar: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: And if you ever obey a human like yourselves, then you would certainly be losers.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُواْ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَلِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: O messengers! Eat from what is good and lawful, and act righteously. Indeed, I fully know what you do.

ayah_ar: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ زُبُرٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Yet the people have divided it into different sects, each rejoicing in what they have.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Surely those who tremble in awe of their Lord,

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: But as soon as We seize their elite with torment, they start to cry for help.

ayah_ar: ۞وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرّٖ لَّلَجُّواْ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Even if We had mercy on them and removed their affliction, they would still persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.

ayah_ar: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٖ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍۚ إِذٗا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَٰهِۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Allah has never had any offspring, nor is there any god besides Him. Otherwise, each god would have taken away what he created, and they would have tried to dominate one another. Glorified is Allah above what they claim!

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: We are indeed able to show you what We have threatened them with.

ayah_ar: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: And say, My Lord! I seek refuge in You from the temptations of the devils.

ayah_ar: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: The Fire will burn their faces, leaving them deformed.

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Whoever invokes, besides Allah, another godfor which they can have no proofthey will surely find their penalty with their Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will never succeed.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي صَلَاتِهِمۡ خَٰشِعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who humble themselves in prayer;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنِ ٱللَّغۡوِ مُعۡرِضُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who avoid idle talk;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَٰعِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who pay almstax;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and those who are properly observant of their prayers.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Paradise as their own. They will be there forever.

ayah_ar: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And pray, My Lord! Allow me a blessed landing, for You are the best accommodator.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and who believe in the revelations of their Lord,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ لَا يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and who associate none with their Lord,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَواْ وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ رَٰجِعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and who do whatever good they do with their hearts fearful, knowing that they will return to their Lord

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is they who race to do good deeds, always taking the lead.

ayah_ar: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَاۚ وَلَدَيۡنَا كِتَٰبٞ يَنطِقُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: We never require of any soul more than what it can afford. And with Us is a record which speaks the truth. None will be wronged.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: And ask them, Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?

ayah_ar: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Today I have indeed rewarded them for their perseverance: they are certainly the triumphant.

ayah_ar: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He is simply insane, so bear with him for a while.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Noah prayed, My Lord! Help me, because they have denied me.

ayah_ar: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٖ لَّيُصۡبِحُنَّ نَٰدِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Allah responded, Soon they will be truly regretful.

ayah_ar: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Do they think, since We provide them with wealth and children,

ayah_ar: قَدۡ كَانَتۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡقَٰبِكُمۡ تَنكِصُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Indeed, My revelations were recited to you, but you used to back away in disgust,

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He is the One Who created for you hearing, sight, and intellect. Yet you hardly give any thanks.

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: When death approaches any of them, they cry, My Lord! Let me go back,

ayah_ar: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: As for those whose scale is heavy with good deeds, it is they who will be successful.

ayah_ar: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Our Lord! Take us out of this Fire. Then if we ever return to denial, we will truly be wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: ۞هَٰذَانِ خَصۡمَانِ ٱخۡتَصَمُواْ فِي رَبِّهِمۡۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ قُطِّعَتۡ لَهُمۡ ثِيَابٞ مِّن نَّارٖ يُصَبُّ مِن فَوۡقِ رُءُوسِهِمُ ٱلۡحَمِيمُ
label: anger
ayah_en: These are two opposing groups that disagree about their Lord: as for the disbelievers, garments of Fire will be cut out for them and boiling water will be poured over their heads,

ayah_ar: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَن يُخۡلِفَ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ يَوۡمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلۡفِ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They challenge you O Prophet to hasten the torment. And Allah will never fail in His promise. But a day with your Lord is indeed like a thousand years by your counting.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: anger
ayah_en: But those who strive to discredit Our revelations, they will be the residents of the Hellfire.

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: And certainly the Hour is coming, there is no doubt about it. And Allah will surely resurrect those in the graves.

ayah_ar: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ
label: fear
ayah_en: melting whatever is in their bellies, along with their skin.

ayah_ar: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَا مِنۡ غَمٍّ أُعِيدُواْ فِيهَا وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Whenever they try to escape from Hellout of anguishthey will be forced back into it, and will be told, Taste the torment of burning!

ayah_ar: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمۡ قُلُوبٞ يَعۡقِلُونَ بِهَآ أَوۡ ءَاذَانٞ يَسۡمَعُونَ بِهَاۖ فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعۡمَى ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَلَٰكِن تَعۡمَى ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِي فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Have they not travelled throughout the land so their hearts may reason, and their ears may listen? Indeed, it is not the eyes that are blind, but it is the hearts in the chests that grow blind.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: And He is the One Who gave you life, then will cause you to die, and then will bring you back to life. But surely humankind is ever ungrateful.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Allah will judge between you all on Judgment Day regarding your differences.

ayah_ar: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: They have not shown Allah the reverence He deserves. Surely Allah is AllPowerful, Almighty.

ayah_ar: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
label: fear
ayah_en: He knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them. And to Allah all matters will be returned for judgment.

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ
label: joy
ayah_en: And so We revealed this Quran as clear verses. And Allah certainly guides whoever He wills.

ayah_ar: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
label: joy
ayah_en: for they have been guided to the best of speech, and they have been guided to the Commendable Path.

ayah_ar: وَأَذِّن فِي ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَجِّ يَأۡتُوكَ رِجَالٗا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٖ يَأۡتِينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَمِيقٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: Call all people to the pilgrimage. They will come to you on foot and on every lean camel from every distant path,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لۡيَقۡضُواْ تَفَثَهُمۡ وَلۡيُوفُواْ نُذُورَهُمۡ وَلۡيَطَّوَّفُواْ بِٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
label: joy
ayah_en: Then let them groom themselves, fulfil their vows, and circle the Ancient House.

ayah_ar: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
label: joy
ayah_en: You may benefit from sacrificial animals for an appointed term, then their place of sacrifice is at the Ancient House.

ayah_ar: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: Permission to fight back is hereby granted to those being fought, for they have been wronged. And Allah is truly Most Capable of helping them prevail.

ayah_ar: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: He will certainly admit them into a place they will be pleased with. For Allah is truly AllKnowing, Most Forbearing.

ayah_ar: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: If they deny you O Prophet, so did the people of Noah before them, as well as the tribes of d and Thamd,

ayah_ar: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Not a single society We destroyed before them ever believed after receiving the signs. Will these pagans then believe?

ayah_ar: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: In fact, We hurl the truth against falsehood, leaving it crushed, and it quickly vanishes. And woe be to you for what you claim!

ayah_ar: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Or have they taken gods from the earth, who can raise the dead?

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: And they say, The Most Compassionate has offspring! Glory be to Him! In fact, those angels are only His honoured servants,

ayah_ar: ۞وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Whoever of them were to say, I am a god besides Him, they would be rewarded with Hell by Us. This is how We reward the wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا لَهَا عَٰبِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They replied, We found our forefathers worshipping them.

ayah_ar: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: Shame on you and whatever you worship instead of Allah! Do you not have any sense?

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: They concluded, Burn him up to avenge your gods, if you must act.

ayah_ar: وَعَلَّمۡنَٰهُ صَنۡعَةَ لَبُوسٖ لَّكُمۡ لِتُحۡصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأۡسِكُمۡۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُمۡ شَٰكِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: We taught him the art of making body armour to protect you in battle. Will you then be grateful?

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ قَصَمۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٖ كَانَتۡ ظَالِمَةٗ وَأَنشَأۡنَا بَعۡدَهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Imagine how many societies of wrongdoers We have destroyed, raising up other people after them!

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: When the wrongdoers sensed the arrival of Our torment, they started to run away from their cities.

ayah_ar: لَا تَرۡكُضُواْ وَٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَٰكِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: They were told, Do not run away! Return to your luxuries and your homes, so you may be questioned about your fate.

ayah_ar: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: who do not speak until He has spoken, only acting at His command.

ayah_ar: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يَشۡفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَتِهِۦ مُشۡفِقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: He fully knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them. They do not intercede except for whom He approves, and they tremble in awe of Him.

ayah_ar: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Every soul will taste death. And We test you O humanity with good and evil as a trial, then to Us you will all be returned.

ayah_ar: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
label: fear
ayah_en: Humankind is made of haste. I will soon show you My signs, so do not ask Me to hasten them.

ayah_ar: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: In fact, the Hour will take them by surprise, leaving them stunned. So they will not be able to avert it, nor will it be delayed from them.

ayah_ar: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: He replied sarcastically, No, this onethe biggest of themdid it! So ask them, if they can talk!

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ نَطۡوِي ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَيِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلۡكُتُبِۚ كَمَا بَدَأۡنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلۡقٖ نُّعِيدُهُۥۚ وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: On that Day We will roll up the heavens like a scroll of writings. Just as We produced the first creation, so shall We reproduce it. That is a promise binding on Us. We truly uphold Our promises!

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Surely this Quran is sufficient as a reminder for those devoted to worship.

ayah_ar: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: He cannot be questioned about what He does, but they will all be questioned.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
label: joy
ayah_en: We never sent a messenger before you O Prophet without revealing to him: There is no god worthy of worship except Me, so worship Me alone.

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And We have made the sky a wellprotected canopy, still they turn away from its signs.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: And He is the One Who created the day and the night, the sun and the mooneach travelling in an orbit.

ayah_ar: وَنَضَعُ ٱلۡمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلۡقِسۡطَ لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٍ أَتَيۡنَا بِهَاۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَٰسِبِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: We will set up the scales of justice on the Day of Judgment, so no soul will be wronged in the least. And even if a deed is the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as a vigilant Reckoner.

ayah_ar: وَأَرَادُواْ بِهِۦ كَيۡدٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: They had sought to harm him, but We made them the worst losers.

ayah_ar: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: And remember when Noah had cried out to Us earlier, so We responded to him and delivered him and his family from the great distress.

ayah_ar: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So We answered his prayer and rescued him from anguish. And so do We save the true believers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
label: joy
ayah_en: O prophets! Indeed, this religion of yours is only one, and I am your Lord, so worship Me alone.

ayah_ar: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا كُفۡرَانَ لِسَعۡيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَٰتِبُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: So whoever does good and is a believer will never be denied the reward for their striving, for We are recording it all.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Surely those for whom We have destined the finest reward will be kept far away from Hell,

ayah_ar: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: not even hearing the slightest hissing from it. And they will delight forever in what their souls desire.

ayah_ar: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: The Supreme Horror of that Day will not disturb them, and the angels will greet them, saying, This is your Day, which you have been promised.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: Surely, following the heavenly Record, We decreed in the Scriptures: My righteous servants shall inherit the land.

ayah_ar: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Had there been other gods besides Allah in the heavens or the earth, both realms would have surely been corrupted. So Glorified is Allah, Lord of the Throne, far above what they claim.

ayah_ar: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: We have not granted immortality to any human before you O Prophet: so if you die, will they live forever?

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Ask them, O  Prophet, Who can defend you by day or by night against the Most Compassionate? Still they turn away from the remembrance of their Lord.

ayah_ar: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Remember when he questioned his father and his people, What are these statues to which you are so devoted?

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: They demanded, Bring him before the eyes of the people, so that they may witness his trial.

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: They asked, Was it you who did this to our gods, O  Abraham?

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He rebuked them, Do you then worshipinstead of Allahwhat can neither benefit nor harm you in any way?

ayah_ar: ۞وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And remember when Job cried out to his Lord, I have been touched with adversity, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

ayah_ar: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَٰضِبٗا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: And remember when the Man of the Whale stormed off from his city in a rage, thinking We would not restrain him. he cried out, There is no god worthy of worship except You. Glory be to You! I have certainly done wrong.

ayah_ar: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ ءَاذَنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٖۖ وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: If they turn away, then say, I have warned you all equally. I do not know if what you are threatened with is near or far.

ayah_ar: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنۡهَا مَن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرۡدَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: So do not let those who disbelieve in it and follow their desires distract you from it, or you will be doomed.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: And We certainly showed Pharaoh all of Our signs, but he denied them and refused to believe.

ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: Pharaoh then withdrew, orchestrated his scheme, then returned.

ayah_ar: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiersbut how overwhelming were the waters that submerged them!

ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِۖ أَفَعَصَيۡتَ أَمۡرِي
label: anger
ayah_en: from following after me? How could you disobey my orders?

ayah_ar: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: They will whisper among themselves, You stayed no more than ten days on the earth.

ayah_ar: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعٗا صَفۡصَفٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: leaving the earth level and bare,

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: But whoever does good and is a believer will have no fear of being wronged or denied their reward.

ayah_ar: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: And remember when We said to the angels, Prostrate before Adam, so they all didbut not Iblis, who refused arrogantly.

ayah_ar: فَقُلۡنَا يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَٰذَا عَدُوّٞ لَّكَ وَلِزَوۡجِكَ فَلَا يُخۡرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ فَتَشۡقَىٰٓ
label: anger
ayah_en: So We cautioned, O Adam! This is surely an enemy to you and to your wife. So do not let him drive you both out of Paradise, for you O Adam would then suffer hardship.

ayah_ar: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: Allah will respond, It is so, just as Our revelations came to you and you neglected them, so Today you are neglected.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: They demand, If only he could bring us a sign from his Lord!

ayah_ar: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: the Most Compassionate, Who is established on the Throne.

ayah_ar: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى
label: fear
ayah_en: Whether you speak openly or not, He certainly knows what is secret and what is even more hidden.

ayah_ar: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى
label: fear
ayah_en: It is truly I. I am your Lord! So take off your sandals, for you are in the sacred valley of uwa.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخۡفِيهَا لِتُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا تَسۡعَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: The Hour is sure to come. My Will is to keep it hidden, so that every soul may be rewarded according to their efforts.

ayah_ar: أَنِ ٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ ٱلۡيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُوّٞ لِّي وَعَدُوّٞ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: Put him into a chest, then put it into the river. The river will wash it ashore, and he will be taken by Pharaoh, an enemy of Mine and his. And I blessed you with lovability from Me O Moses so that you would be brought up under My watchful Eye.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: It has indeed been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies the truth and turns away.

ayah_ar: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى
label: fear
ayah_en: He replied, That knowledge is with my Lord in a Record. My Lord neither falters nor forgets anything.

ayah_ar: ۞مِنۡهَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا نُخۡرِجُكُمۡ تَارَةً أُخۡرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will bring you back again.

ayah_ar: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا
label: fear
ayah_en: Whoever turns away from it will surely bear the burden of sin on the Day of Judgment,

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Beware of the Day the Trumpet will be blown,

ayah_ar: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجٗا وَلَآ أَمۡتٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: with neither depressions nor elevations to be seen.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: On that Day all will follow the caller for assembly, and none will dare to deviate. All voices will be hushed before the Most Compassionate. Only whispers will be heard.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: On that Day no intercession will be of any benefit, except by those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are agreeable to Him.

ayah_ar: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: He fully knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them,

ayah_ar: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: Say to them, O  Prophet, Each of us is waiting, so keep waiting! You will soon know who is on the Straight Path and is rightly guided.

ayah_ar: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى
label: joy
ayah_en: It is a revelation from the One Who created the earth and the high heavens

ayah_ar: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى
label: joy
ayah_en: It is truly I. I am your Lord! So take off your sandals, for you are in the sacred valley of uwa.

ayah_ar: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ
label: joy
ayah_en: It is truly I. I am Allah! There is no god worthy of worship except Me. So worship Me alone, and establish prayer for My remembrance.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشۡرَحۡ لِي صَدۡرِي
label: joy
ayah_en: Moses prayed, My Lord! Uplift my heart for me,

ayah_ar: وَيَسِّرۡ لِيٓ أَمۡرِي
label: joy
ayah_en: and make my task easy,

ayah_ar: وَنَذۡكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
label: joy
ayah_en: and remember You much,

ayah_ar: وَٱصۡطَنَعۡتُكَ لِنَفۡسِي
label: joy
ayah_en: And I have selected you for My service.

ayah_ar: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي
label: joy
ayah_en: Go forth, you and your brother, with My signs and never falter in remembering Me.

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: Allah reassured them, Have no fear! I am with you, hearing and seeing.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: He answered, Our Lord is the One Who has given everything its distinctive form, then guided it.

ayah_ar: قُلۡنَا لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: We reassured him, Do not fear! It is certainly you who will prevail.

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: But whoever comes to Him as a believer, having done good, they will have the highest ranks:

ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: the Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, where they will stay forever. That is the reward of those who purify themselves.

ayah_ar: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٞ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا ثُمَّ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: But I am truly Most Forgiving to whoever repents, believes, and does good, then persists on true guidance.

ayah_ar: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Exalted is Allah, the True King! Do not rush to recite a revelation of the Quran O Prophet before it is properly conveyed to you, and pray, My Lord! Increase me in knowledge.

ayah_ar: قَالَ هِيَ عَصَايَ أَتَوَكَّؤُاْ عَلَيۡهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِي وَلِيَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخۡرَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He replied, It is my staff! I lean on it, and with it I beat down branches for my sheep, and have other uses for it.

ayah_ar: ٱشۡدُدۡ بِهِۦٓ أَزۡرِي
label: sadness
ayah_en: Strengthen me through him,

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَٰمُوسَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Pharaoh asked, Who then is the Lord of you two, O  Moses?

ayah_ar: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى
label: sadness
ayah_en: Moses said, Your appointment is on the Day of the Festival, and let the people be gathered midmorning.

ayah_ar: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: He replied, They are close on my tracks. And I have hastened to You, my Lord, so You will be pleased.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Moses scolded his brother, O Aaron! What prevented you, when you saw them going astray,

ayah_ar: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذۡ يَقُولُ أَمۡثَلُهُمۡ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا يَوۡمٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: We know best what they will saythe most reasonable of them will say, You stayed no more than a day.

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطَا مِنۡهَا جَمِيعَۢاۖ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشۡقَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: Allah said, Descend, both of you, from here together with Satan as enemies to each other. Then when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray in this life nor suffer in the next.

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: They will cry, My Lord! Why have you raised me up blind, although I used to see?

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: saying, My Lord! Surely my bones have become brittle, and grey hair has spread across my head, but I have never been disappointed in my prayer to You, my Lord!

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِي يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ لَأَرۡجُمَنَّكَۖ وَٱهۡجُرۡنِي مَلِيّٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: He threatened, How dare you reject my idols, O  Abraham! If you do not desist, I will certainly stone you to death. So be gone from me for a long time!

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Imagine, O  Prophet how many peoples We have destroyed before them, who were far better in luxury and splendour!

ayah_ar: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Not at all! We certainly record whatever he claims and will increase his punishment extensively.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: They say, The Most Compassionate has offspring.

ayah_ar: لَّقَدۡ جِئۡتُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِدّٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: You have certainly made an outrageous claim,

ayah_ar: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا
label: anger
ayah_en: by which the heavens are about to burst, the earth to split apart, and the mountains to crumble to pieces

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: He responded, I am only a messenger from your Lord, sent to bless you with a pure son.

ayah_ar: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٖۖ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥٓۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
label: fear
ayah_en: It is not for Allah to take a son! Glory be to Him. When He decrees a matter, He simply tells it, Be! And it is!

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: Indeed, it is We Who will succeed the earth and whoever is on it. And to Us they will all be returned.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: They have taken other gods, instead of Allah, seeking strength and protection through them.

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Do you O Prophet not see that We have sent the devils against the disbelievers, constantly inciting them?

ayah_ar: وَكُلُّهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَرۡدًا
label: fear
ayah_en: And each of them will return to Him on the Day of Judgment all alone.

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هَلۡ تُحِسُّ مِنۡهُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَوۡ تَسۡمَعُ لَهُمۡ رِكۡزَۢا
label: fear
ayah_en: Imagine how many peoples We have destroyed before them! Do you still see any of them, or even hear from them the slightest sound?

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: He wondered, My Lord! How can I have a son when my wife is barren, and I have become extremely old?

ayah_ar: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞ وَقَدۡ خَلَقۡتُكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ تَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: An angel replied, So will it be! Your Lord says, It is easy for Me, just as I created you before, when you were nothing!

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: Jesus also declared, Surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him alone. This is the Straight Path.

ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: They will be in the Gardens of Eternity, promised in trust by the Most Compassionate to His servants. Surely His promise will be fulfilled.

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوًا إِلَّا سَلَٰمٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ رِزۡقُهُمۡ فِيهَا بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: There they will never hear any idle talkonly greetings of peace. And there they will have their provisions morning and evening.

ayah_ar: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: That is Paradise, which We will grant to whoever is devout among Our servants.

ayah_ar: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
label: joy
ayah_en: And Allah increases in guidance those who are rightly guided. And the everlasting good deeds are far better with your Lord in reward and in outcome.

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Watch for the Day We will gather the righteous before the Most Compassionate as an honoured delegation,

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
label: joy
ayah_en: It does not befit the majesty of the Most Compassionate to have children.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who believe and do good, the Most Compassionate will certainly bless them with genuine love.

ayah_ar: إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: when he cried out to his Lord privately,

ayah_ar: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: She appealed, I truly seek refuge in the Most Compassionate from you! So leave me alone if you are Godfearing.

ayah_ar: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: So a voice reassured her from below her, Do not grieve! Your Lord has provided a stream at your feet.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: O  dear father! Do not worship Satan. Surely Satan is ever rebellious against the Most Compassionate.

ayah_ar: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: As I distance myself from all of you and from whatever you invoke besides Allah, I will continue to call upon my Lord alone, trusting that I will never be disappointed in invoking my Lord.

ayah_ar: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: So do not be in haste against them, for indeed We are closely counting down their days.

ayah_ar: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: There is none in the heavens or the earth who will not return to the Most Compassionate in full submission.

ayah_ar: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: and to warn those who claim, Allah has offspring.

ayah_ar: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
label: anger
ayah_en: Have you O Prophet thought that the people of the cave and the plaque were the only wonders of Our signs?

ayah_ar: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Those are the societies We destroyed when they persisted in wrong, and We had set a time for their destruction.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتۡ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ فِي غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكۡرِي وَكَانُواْ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَمۡعًا
label: anger
ayah_en: those who turned a blind eye to My Reminder and could not stand listening to it.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: then We raised them so We may show which of the two groups would make a better estimation of the length of their stay.

ayah_ar: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: The wicked will see the Fire and realize that they are bound to fall into it, and will find no way to avoid it.

ayah_ar: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Moses assured him, You will find me patient, Allah willing, and I will not disobey any of your orders.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: Surely We established him in the land, and gave him the means to all things.

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: So it was. And We truly had full knowledge of him.

ayah_ar: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: And so the enemies could neither scale nor tunnel through it.

ayah_ar: وَعَرَضۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَرۡضًا
label: fear
ayah_en: On that Day We will display Hell clearly for the disbelievers,

ayah_ar: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: But as for me: He is Allah, my Lord, and I will never associate anyone with my Lord in worship.

ayah_ar: ٱلۡمَالُ وَٱلۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ أَمَلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: Wealth and children are the adornment of this worldly life, but the everlasting good deeds are far better with your Lord in reward and in hope.

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: As for those who believe and do good, they will have the finest reward, and we will assign them easy commands.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: And We will certainly reduce whatever is on it to barren ground.

ayah_ar: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: So We caused them to fall into a dead sleep in the cave for many years,

ayah_ar: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: They had remained in their cave for three hundred years, adding nine.

ayah_ar: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصۡبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيۡهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُشۡرِكۡ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: And so all his produce was totally ruined, so he started to wring his hands for all he had spent on it, while it had collapsed on its trellises. He cried, Alas! I wish I had never associated anyone with my Lord in worship!

ayah_ar: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: And he had no manpower to help him against Allah, nor could he even help himself.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: We have surely set forth in this Quran every kind of lesson for people, but humankind is the most argumentative of all beings.

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَإِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتَنِي فَلَا تَسۡـَٔلۡنِي عَن شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ أُحۡدِثَ لَكَ مِنۡهُ ذِكۡرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: He responded, Then if you follow me, do not question me about anything until I myself clarify it for you.

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: He replied, Did I not say that you cannot have patience with me?

ayah_ar: فَأَرَدۡنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُ زَكَوٰةٗ وَأَقۡرَبَ رُحۡمٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: So we hoped that their Lord would give them another, more virtuous and caring in his place.

ayah_ar: قُلۡ هَلۡ نُنَبِّئُكُم بِٱلۡأَخۡسَرِينَ أَعۡمَٰلًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Shall we inform you of who will lose the most deeds?

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: They are those whose efforts are in vain in this worldly life, while they think they are doing good!

ayah_ar: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, If the ocean were ink for writing the Words of my Lord, it would certainly run out before the Words of my Lord were finished, even if We refilled it with its equal.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَآ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نُّهۡلِكَ قَرۡيَةً أَمَرۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهَا فَفَسَقُواْ فِيهَا فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهَا تَدۡمِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Whenever We intend to destroy a society, We command its elite to obey Allah but they act rebelliously in it. So the decree of punishment is justified, and We destroy it utterly.

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ نُوحٖۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Imagine how many peoples We have destroyed after Noah! And sufficient is your Lord as AllAware and AllSeeing of the sins of His servants.

ayah_ar: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Do not set up any other god with Allah, or you will end up condemned, abandoned.

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا
label: anger
ayah_en: Do not be so tightfisted, for you will be blameworthy; nor so openhanded, for you will end up in poverty.

ayah_ar: أَفَأَصۡفَىٰكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ وَٱتَّخَذَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنَٰثًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلًا عَظِيمٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Has your Lord favoured you pagans with sons and taken angels as His daughters? You are truly making an outrageous claim.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ وَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: We have surely varied the signs in this Quran so perhaps they may be mindful, but it only drives them farther away.

ayah_ar: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Glorified and Highly Exalted is He above what they claim!

ayah_ar: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: See how they call you names O Prophet! So they have gone so far astray that they cannot find the Right Way.

ayah_ar: ۞قُلۡ كُونُواْ حِجَارَةً أَوۡ حَدِيدًا
label: anger
ayah_en: Say, O Prophet, Yes, even if you become stones, or iron,

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَكَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كَرَّمۡتَ عَلَيَّ لَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡتَنِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَأَحۡتَنِكَنَّ ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: Adding, Do you see this one you honoured above me? If you delay my end until the Day of Judgment, I will certainly take hold of his descendants, except for a few.

ayah_ar: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَسۡتَفِزُّونَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُخۡرِجُوكَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَإِذٗا لَّا يَلۡبَثُونَ خِلَٰفَكَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: They were about to intimidate you to drive you out of the land of Mecca, but then they would not have survived after you had left except for a little while.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ كَانَ يَـُٔوسٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: When We grant people Our favours, they turn away, acting arrogantly. But when touched with evil, they lose all hope.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا
label: anger
ayah_en: They challenge the Prophet, We will never believe in you until you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us,

ayah_ar: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٞ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَعِنَبٖ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا
label: anger
ayah_en: or until you have a garden of palm trees and vineyards, and cause rivers to flow abundantly in it,

ayah_ar: أَوۡ تُسۡقِطَ ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَمَا زَعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفًا أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ قَبِيلًا
label: anger
ayah_en: or cause the sky to fall upon us in pieces, as you have claimed, or bring Allah and the angels before us, face to face,

ayah_ar: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرٗا رَّسُولٗا
label: anger
